equipment.name: RS25
equipment.description: The most complicated rocket engine ever produced. Just let it dry for a month between uses

equipment.name: Shuttle Derived Solid Rocket Booster
equipment.description: Want to go somewhere fast? This is a great option! And it might look appealing, but don't lick the forbidden propellant... it won't end well

equipment.name: Raptor V3
equipment.description: 'Partially assembled engine'(Tory Bruno, ULA)... Nope, that's just how simplified it is.
